text:
From 10 Aug:
Up to 50 persons per class in groups of up to 5 persons, strongly encouraged to go online.
Refer to MOEâ€™s advisory for further details (Separate safe management measures for higher-risk arts and sports classes apply.)
Home-based tuition/enrichment which run in-person lessons are subject to the prevailing national group size limit and number of unique visitors allowed per household per day.
